github.releaseNotes: if [ -n "${latestTag}" ] && [ "${latestTag}" != "null" ]; then git log --no-merges --pretty=format:"* %s %h" ${latestTag}...main | grep -v 'release v[0-9]\{1,3\}\.[0-9]\{1,3\}\.[0-9]\{1,3\}'; else git log --no-merges --pretty=format:"* %s %h" | head -20 | grep -v 'release v[0-9]\{1,3\}\.[0-9]\{1,3\}\.[0-9]\{1,3\}'; fi
